name: The Ferryman's Assistant
description:
A ferryman has been tasked with finding a hidden key but he's not planning on doing any of the work. As his assistant you must find the key.

A short single level puzzle game.

Game Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • E to interact

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Colour by Larissa Tamayoshi

Early Gameboy font by Jimmy Campbell (LINK)
